titleStmt.title: A letter from a country minister to some neighbouring-clergy concerning the usual resort of his parishioners to other churches in contempt of their own.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Walter Kettilby, at the Bishop's Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.

place.placeName: the Bishop's Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard
